data.message: Hats off to the Zuckerberg. It's great to see what freedom can do. To all the naysayers' negative remarks, what have you done to help anyone?

replies.message: Thanks for your support, Yvon. Together we can gather enough support to fight this deadly disease! -Sarah

I have some creep with 9 different accounts harassing me. I have reported them all. Why are you allowing this? I have actually had to contact law enforcement for cyber stalking and you have still done nothing about it, but you have plenty of time to harass people with odd names? I think you need to get your priorities in order.
Support American charities -- causes like Alzheimers, Epilepsy and Parkingson's.  That's what I do Yvon.
